The statement made by Rush Limbaugh: a radio host, claiming that the novel coronavirus is just the common cold.
The circulation of a photo on social med: 3. The clarification from the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) stating that the virus causing COVID-19 is not the same as the coronaviruses that commonly cause the common cold.
The information provided by experts: such as Justin Lessler from John Hopkins University, stating that the novel coronavirus is a more serious strain and more deadly than the established human coronaviruses that cause the common cold.
